data.name: Monster Energy Supercross 4 - Allegiance Pack
data.detailed_description:
Buy Allegiance Pack and customize game menus, profiles and in-game elements with content of these brands: Suzuki, Yamaha, KTM, Kawasaki, Honda and Husqvarna.

It includes:
- Dedicated main menu backgrounds
- Dedicated player profile backgrounds
- Game menu icons
data.about_the_game:
Buy Allegiance Pack and customize game menus, profiles and in-game elements with content of these brands: Suzuki, Yamaha, KTM, Kawasaki, Honda and Husqvarna.

It includes:
- Dedicated main menu backgrounds
- Dedicated player profile backgrounds
- Game menu icons
data.short_description: Buy Allegiance Pack and prove your allegiance to your favourite bike manufacturer!

fullgame.name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 4

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
